articles.title: Liver Transplants Soar as Some Americans Drink Their Way Through the Pandemic - MedicineNet
articles.description: Demand for liver transplants among heavy drinking Americans surged during the COVID-19 pandemic, a new study shows.
articles.content:

articles.title: Judge in Prince Andrew sex abuse suit says key document can be secret - World News - Castanet.net
